name: atomblast.io
description: First attempt at multiplayer online io game

scripts.test: (jest && echo " \033[1;40;32m Unit testing passed.\033[m ") || (echo " \033[1;41;33m Unit testing failed.\033[m " && exit 1)
scripts.lint:
echo 'Working directory: ' && pwd && echo '
Please wait. Lint Checking...
' && ((npm run env-test && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint ./src/ && echo " \033[1;40;32m Linting Passed. \033[m " ) || ( (echo "$(tput setaf 5)$(tput setab 0)linting check failed and aborted. Run 'npm run fix-lint' to attemp automatic fix \033[m " && exit 1)))
scripts.fix-lint:
npm run -s env-test; (echo 'Please wait. Linting...
' && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint ./src/ --fix) || (echo " \033[1;41;33m Auto Linting failed. Please manually fix the above errors. \033[m " && exit 1)
scripts.env-test:
if [ -d './src/' ]; then echo " \033[1;40;32m src directory detected! \033[m "; else echo " \033[1;41;33m 

CRITICAL: src directory NOT DETECTED
ABORTING!!!

 \033[m " && exit 1; fi
scripts.precommitold: npm run -s lint && echo "Running unit testing.." && npm test
scripts.precommit: npm run -s lint && echo "Generating Documentation..." && npm run docs

author: Bananium Labs
